/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery over the road. The buildings, painted in shades of brown and gray, add a touch of urban charm to the scene. Cars and trucks are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy life of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the busy street below.
